name: RhiemProductCredit

infos.name: Produktgutschriften
infos.description:
Ermöglicht es dir ganz einfach über die Administration Gutschriften von ausgewählten Produkte und Lieferkosten einer Bestellung zu erstellen. Wahlweise können die gutgeschriebenen Artikel wieder dem Lagerbestand hinzugefügt werden. Die Gutschriften werden deinen Kunden in ihrer Bestellübersicht angezeigt.


Dokumentation

Shopware 6 Produktgutschrift (rhiem-intermedia.de)

Lizenzbestimmungen

Bitte beachte unsere Lizenzbestimmungen:https://rhiem-intermedia.de/lizenzbestimmungen

Mit der Benutzung unserer App bestätigst du, dass du die Lizenzbestimmungen gelesen hast und damit einverstanden bist.

Fragen zum App?

Gerne unterstützen wir dich bei der Installation oder weiteren Fragen zur Verwendung der App. 
Bitte nutze dafür die Shopware-App-Support Funktion in deinem Shopware-Account.

Individuelle Appentwicklung?

Als Shopware Solution-Partner mit langjähriger Erfahrung stehen wir dir gerne mit Rat und Tat zur Seite.

Schreibe uns eine Email: shopware@rhiem.com oder 
rufe uns an: +49 (0) 28 55 – 97 00 55

Weitere Informationen über uns findest du auf unserer Shopware-Partnerseite: 
https://de.shopware.com/RHIEM-Intermedia-GmbH/
infos.installationManual:
Installiere die App in der Administration über den Reiter:

|-- Administration

infos.shortDescription: Erstelle Gutschriften für Produkte und Lieferkosten einer Bestellung. Gutgeschriebene Produkte können wahlweise wieder dem Lagerbestand hinzugefügt werden.
infos.highlights:
Lieferkosten Gutschreiben
Produkte Gutschreiben
Anzeige der Gutschriften in der Bestellübersicht des Kunden
Gutgeschriebene Produkte dem Lagerbestand hinzufügen
Rabatte bei der Gutschrift berücksichtigen

infos.name: Product Credit
infos.description:
Allows you to easily create credits of selected products and delivery costs of an order via the administration. Optionally, the credited items can be added back to the stock. The credits are displayed to your customers in their order overview.


Documentation

Shopware 6 Rental Products (rhiem-intermedia.de)

License Agreement

Please note our license agreement:https://rhiem-intermedia.de/license-agreement

By using our plugin you confirm that you have read the license agreement and agree with it.

Questions about the plugin?

We are happy to support you with the installation or further questions regarding the use of the plugin. 
Please use the Shopware plugin support function in your Shopware account.

Individual plugin development?

As a Shopware Solution Partner with many years of experience, we are happy to help you with words and deeds.

Write us an email: shopware@rhiem.com or
give us a call: +49 (0) 28 55 - 97 00 55

For more information about us, please visit our Shopware partner page:
https://en.shopware.com/RHIEM-Intermedia-GmbH/
infos.installationManual:
Install the plugin in the administration via the tab:

|-- Administration

    └ Extensions

        └My extensions

            └ Upload extensions
infos.shortDescription: Create credits for selected products and delivery costs of an order in the administration. Credited products can optionally be added back to the stock.
infos.highlights:
Delivery costs credit
Credit products
Display of credits in the customer's order overview
Add credited items to stock

changelog.text: • Bugfix: Crediting shipping costs to tax free countries was not possible
Addition of the product number in the credit note name.
Compatibility to Shopware 6.5
• Bugfix: Crediting shipping costs to tax free countries was not possible
• fixed another error in the stock reversal
• Fixed an error in the stock reversal

• Compatibility with Klarna plugin
  • Bugfix: available stock is not updated
• Compatibility with Shopware 6.4.20.0
• Bugfix for NEXT-24108

• Bugfix: Creating PDF was possible without credit notes in invoice
  • CustomProducts products were displayed without an image in the Offcanvas shopping cart

• Bugfix: Error in product selection in net orders
  • Bugfix: Incorrect prices in credit notes for net orders
• Bugfix: Incorrect total sum when crediting multiple positions
• Fixed an issue that in some cases credit notes could not be created.
• Fixed an error that caused the credited shipping costs not to be included in the credit note.pdf.
• Bugfix: deviating signs in credit note
• Bugfix: title missing in credit note
• Incorrect total price in credit notes
• Compatibility with Custom Products

- Compatibility to Shopware 6.4
- Added a promotion field to the credit window, where a discount can be added per product. This adds the possibility to reduce the amount credited, so products bought on sale won't be credited in full.
• Bugfix: An error occurs when changing the order in the customer account
• Bugfix: document credit lineitems are not listed
• Credit notes are also displayed in documents of the credit note type
• Initial plugin release
